result.arabic_text: إِن كَانَتۡ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَإِذَا هُمۡ جَمِيعٞ لَّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَرُونَ
result.translation: Haitakuwa ila ukelele mmoja tu, mara wote watahudhuruishwa mbele yetu.
result.footnotes: Wito wao wa kuwatoa hautakuwa ila ukelele mmoja tu, mara wote watakusanywa mbele yetu wahudhurishwe ili tuwahisabie.
